ygData.subject: Anyone seen a SPIT lately?
ygData.msgSnippet: Howdy Chefs On EQ_Potters I uploaded a screen capture of Kiln and Pottery Wheel. Ovens seem to be plentiful in Freeport, but as anyone used a SPIT? Could you
ygData.messageBody:
Howdy Chefs

On EQ_Potters I uploaded a screen capture of Kiln and Pottery Wheel.
Ovens seem to be plentiful in Freeport, but as anyone used a SPIT?
Could you screenprint (Saves as .bmp) and by request convert to JPG.
Upload into the shared files.

I have seen baking as a nickle and dime profit if is stick with Rat ears
and Firebeetle Eyes for Edible Goo. You get an average of 2s2c.

With Wolf/Bear Meat - Spices (3c) - Short Beer (varies 1s ish).
You can make fine braised steaks. Candied Spider legs also
are foragable if you have Frosting and Spices.
The problem I've had is saving a Large Sack just for
cooking ingredients and Backpack for the Pottery/Smithing supplies.

An army fights on it's stomach, so not having to buy rations helps.
I havn't been able to afford out right buying a mixing bowl in
West Freeport - 1P2g5s. The sketches available to potters does
not include a mixing bowl. Any clues?

I see Baking deserts with the right tins and pans as potentially
profitable in the field or during an event with Flea market wares.

I just recently was able to make pottery skewers after several
attempts. Haven't baked anything with them yet.

It seems that baking is an 'after' skill of Smithing and Pottery.

Thanks
Cleric Taven (Veeshan)
